title: [Valdorn's Armory]
[Valdorn's Outfitting]
[Valdorn's General Store]
description: Enclosed by blue watered silk walls, the shop features a well-pruned lemon tree in the center of its oak floor.  A fused sun and moon wall-hanging hangs under the fel panel ceiling.  Right near the front is a vine-carved mahogany table and a beveled glass-covered case.
